title: Transforming The Way Kids Learn Through LEGO
itunes:title: Transforming The Way Kids Learn Through LEGO
description:
Esben Staerk, President of LEGO Education, discusses the pandemic's impact on learning. Tim Fiore, Chairman of the Manufacturing Business Survey from the Institute for Supply Management, talks about the monthly ISM report. Ashraf Haque, Senior Portfolio Manager of Sands Capital’s International Growth Portfolio, discusses global investment opportunities following China's regulatory crackdown. Anthony Hatch, Principal and veteran analyst for ABH Consulting, talks about the fate of Canadian National's deal with Kansas City Southern. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Matt Miller.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
